Entry.en-US: Dedicated to one's belief, {0_character} is known as a {1_trait}.
{0_character} is never far from spreading {masculine_0:his:her} beliefs. {masculine_0:He:She} is a {1_trait}!
{0_character} is so skilled at fighting against mercenary opponents that {masculine_0:he:she} is known as {1_trait}!
